body.label: Swapping Ada allocated for OSC proposal to USDM
description: Securing the budgeted dollar value in USDM
justification: Together with the Open Source Committee, Intersect are requesting
to withdraw 5,885,000 ada to undertake USDM stablecoin conversion
of the ada equivalent of 3,000,000 USD.
Due to the lack of liquidity in Cardano stablecoins,
use NBX to perform OTC trade and then
mint new USDM. The destination is controlled by the CDH
